title: T206 Dolly Gray - Polar Bear Back
author: JerBruns

posts.post_title: T206 Dolly Gray - Polar Bear Back
posts.post_content: I don't collect T206 cards, my focus is the 1950s-current, but came across this card at an antique mall this weekend.  I vaguely remember that Polar Bear backs were harder to find than most other backs.  Is that correct?  Would someone know what a good price would be to pay for this card.  It was in a PSA 2 holder.   Thanks for the help.  Jerry
